flawed_nl_solution:
She plays 840 notes because 8 x 60 = <<8*60=840>>840
This is 21 blocks of 40 notes because 840/40=<<840/40=21>>21
She makes 63 mistakes because 21 x 3 = <<21*3=63>>63
#### 63

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 480, not 840. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
